title: Tutorial: The Pawn's Journey
description: You are a pawn at the beginning of a chess game. Choose your preferred move and bet your currency. The collective wisdom of previous players will suggest a move - will you follow or disobey?
background: As a pawn, you have limited options but your choices set the tone for the entire game. The collective wisdom of previous players has learned which openings work best.

consequences.choiceA: Aggressive opening that controls the center

godMove.reasoning: Most players prefer controlling the center with e4
